DocsBot
Use CasesFeaturesPricingDocsDevelopersBlog
Log inTry Free
Custom ChatGPTfor your business!

Instant AI Answersfrom your Docs

Get instant answers for you, your customers, or your team with custom AI chatbots trained with your content and documentation.

Turn your content into AI answers

Try it free, no credit card required. Your customers (and team) will thank you!

Loved by 75k+ users

Trusted by more than 3,000 businesses!

Use Cases

AI Solutions to Real Business Problems

Unlock the potential of your existing content with AI-driven chatbots. Automate customer journeys—leads, presales, onboarding, support, and retention. Empower your team with instant access to knowledge, repurpose content for marketing and sales, and speed up research—all with DocsBot.

Customer Facing Bots

Instant Responses to Customer Queries, 24/7

Transform your pre-sales and customer support with AI-powered chatbots that understand your business. Provide instant, accurate responses while reducing costs and improving customer satisfaction.

Reduce Support Workload
Automatically handle common customer inquiries 24/7, reducing wait times and enabling smooth handovers to human support when needed.
Consistent & Accurate
Deliver precise, consistent answers based on your documentation, ensuring customers always receive reliable information.
Scale Your Support
Handle unlimited concurrent conversations while maintaining high satisfaction rates and building customer loyalty.
Get Instant Answers

Customer Support Bots

Enhance Support Quality with AI-Powered Excellence

Transform your customer support from reactive to proactive. Our AI-powered bots deliver instant, accurate responses 24/7, ensuring consistent quality while dramatically reducing response times and support costs.

Minimize Repetitive Tasks
Free your support team from answering the same questions repeatedly. Let AI handle routine inquiries while your agents focus on complex, high-value interactions that require human expertise.
Better Resource Allocation
Optimize your support operations with first-contact resolution and seamless human handovers. Our AI ensures questions are answered instantly, accurately, or escalated to a human when needed.
Boost Team Morale
Transform your support team's daily experience by eliminating mundane tasks. Watch agent satisfaction soar as they engage in meaningful problem-solving instead of repetitive responses.
Enhance Your Support Quality

Internal Knowledge Access

Boost Productivity Through Instant Information Access

Transform how your team accesses information with AI-powered knowledge retrieval. Our internal documentation bots make finding answers as simple as asking a question, dramatically reducing time spent searching through documents and data from multiple sources.

Boost Your Team Productivity
Knowledge Retrieval
Instantly surface relevant information from your internal documentation, eliminating time spent searching through multiple systems and databases.
Secure Access
Keep your sensitive information protected with enterprise-grade security while providing seamless access to authorized team members.
Continuous Learning
Your bot automatically stays up-to-date as your documentation evolves, ensuring teams always have access to the latest information.

Research Assistant & Document Q&A Bots

Accelerate Research with Fast Reference Discovery

Transform your research process with AI-powered document analysis and insight generation. Quickly find relevant information and discover hidden connections across your entire document library.

Instant Reference Discovery
Quickly surface relevant citations, data points, and research materials from your document library. Save hours of manual searching and cross-referencing.
Comprehensive Analysis
Get detailed insights and connections across your research materials. Our AI helps identify patterns and relationships you might have missed.
Content Repurposing
Transform existing content into new formats and insights. Extract key findings and data to create summaries, presentations, or training materials.
Accelerate Your Research & Copywriting

How It Works

Create your own AI-powered documentation assistant in four simple steps - no coding or technical skills required. Our intuitive process lets anyone go from setup to launch in minutes while ensuring high-quality responses.

Create

Build your bot in minutes

Configure your DocsBot with advanced privacy settings and choose from multiple AI models to perfectly match your needs and use case.

Train

Upload your source data

Easily import content from 37+ sources including docs, websites, cloud connections, and more. Our system automatically processes and indexes everything for optimal performance.

Test & Refine

Fine-tune your bot's responses

Interact with your DocsBot to ensure accuracy, adjust training data, and add custom instructions to handle edge cases. Get detailed logs and analytics to identify areas for improvement.

Launch

Deploy your bot anywhere

Share your DocsBot via a dedicated chat interface, seamlessly embed it into your website, documentation, or help center, or connect to thousands of other apps via Zapier, Make, or our API.

Build your bot in minutes

Configure your DocsBot with advanced privacy settings and choose from multiple AI models to perfectly match your needs and use case.

Upload your source data

Easily import content from 37+ sources including docs, websites, cloud connections, and more. Our system automatically processes and indexes everything for optimal performance.

Fine-tune your bot's responses

Interact with your DocsBot to ensure accuracy, adjust training data, and add custom instructions to handle edge cases. Get detailed logs and analytics to identify areas for improvement.

Deploy your bot anywhere

Share your DocsBot via a dedicated chat interface, seamlessly embed it into your website, documentation, or help center, or connect to thousands of other apps via Zapier, Make, or our API.

Effortless Chatbot Training

Teach your AI Anything with 27+ Content Sources

Our intuitive interface makes it easy to index your documentation, websites, knowledge bases, cloud storage, YouTube videos, support tickets, or any other content with just a few clicks. Schedule automatic updates to keep your assistant up to date.

Document

Upload document files containing text (Text, Office, PDF, HTML, MD, EML, ZIP, CSV, TSV, Images, etc)

Media

Upload any audio or video files for AI transcription and indexing

Q&A

Finetune your bot by providing common questions and answers

Raw Data

Bulk upload raw data via a specially formatted CSV file

Notion

Answer questions from the content of Notion pages (BETA)

Confluence

Answer questions from all Confluence pages (BETA)

Salesforce

Answer questions from the content of your published Salesforce Knowledge articles

Coming Soon

GitBook

Answer questions from the content of GitBook pages for any public or private space

Coming Soon

URL

Answer from the content from a single public webpage

URL List

Index all content from a bulk list of URLs

Sitemap

Answer from all content on a website refrenced by its XML sitemap

RSS Feed

Answer from post content from a blog RSS feed url

WordPress

Upload a WordPress XML export file of your content

YouTube

Answer questions based on the transcripts of a YouTube video or playlist

Google Drive

Answer questions from the content of document files in Google Drive

SharePoint

Answer questions from the content of document files in Microsoft SharePoint (BETA)

Dropbox

Answer questions from the content of document files in Dropbox

Coming Soon

Answer questions from the content of document files in Microsoft OneDrive

Coming Soon

Box

Answer questions from the content of document files in Box cloud storage

Coming Soon

Help Scout Tickets

Answer questions from closed Help Scout tickets (BETA)

Freshdesk Tickets

Answer questions from Freshdesk tickets (BETA)

Zendesk Tickets

Answer questions from Zendesk tickets (BETA)

Zendesk Guide

Answer questions from Zendesk Guide/Help Center articles (BETA)

Intercom

Answer questions from Intercom Help Center articles

Coming Soon

Slack

Answer questions based on the content of your Slack workspace (BETA)

Coming Soon

Gong

Answer questions based on Gong call transcripts

Coming Soon

Gmail

Answer questions based on your Gmail emails

Coming Soon

GitHub

Answer questions based on the files in your GitHub repositories (BETA)

Coming Soon

Amazon S3 / Digital Ocean Spaces

Answer questions based on the content of files in your S3-compatible object storage buckets (BETA)

Coming Soon

Google Cloud Storage

Answer questions based on the content of your Google Cloud Storage buckets (BETA)

scripts: {"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"FAQPage","mainEntity":[{"@type":"Question","name":"Does it work with languages other than English?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes! Unlike traditional search, DocsBot inherits GPT's understanding of any language found on the Internet. So even if you train from your documentation in English, it can still find answers and respond in the language of the question!"}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How does DocsBot work?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"It's a bit technical, but here is a brief overview. We use OpenAI's embedding and ChatGPT APIs, as well as vector databases to store our index. All ingested documentation is cleaned up and divided into smaller chunks and labeled by source. We then generate a vector representation of each chunk and store it in our vector DB index. When a user asks a question, we convert it to an embedding, and perform an advanced semantic & keyword search for closest matches to the user's query. Then we take the most relevant chunks, included them as context along with the original question, and use the ChatGPT API to generate a response in markdown format that we then convert to HTML and display to the user."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Do I need to provide my own OpenAI API key?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Access to the capable GPT-4o mini or GPT-4.1 nano models is included with your plan question limit, and works well for most use cases. To access other models such as the most powerful GPT-4o or GPT-4.1 you need to provide your own OpenAI API key. Instead of simply reselling API access at a premium, we think it is much fairer to have you only pay for the usage you need. We also think it is important for you to have full control and ownership of your data. This also prevents rate limits from causing outages for you if another of our customers has a spike in usage. Each question uses <$0.008 of credit, so costs are minimal. We store your API key securely with AES256 encryption, and it is only used to make calls to OpenAI on your behalf."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can a get a free trial of a higher plan?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Instead of a free trial, we have a free tier lifetime plan that allows you to experience our core features. For qualifying businesses, ask us to enable access to all features of the Pro plan for 14 days, including multiple DocsBots, advanced analytics, and team collaboration features. You can test all source types, integrations, and customization options without any commitment."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How do I upgrade or downgrade my plan?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"You can change your plan at any time from your account dashboard. When upgrading, the new features and limits become available immediately, and we'll prorate any remaining time from your current plan. When downgrading, the new limits take effect immediately as well, and any unused credit will be applied on next billing cycle."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What happens if I exceed my monthly question limit?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"If you reach your monthly question limit, your bot will continue to function but will display a message suggesting users try again later. You can upgrade your plan at any time to increase your limit, or wait for it to reset at the start of your next billing cycle. Business plan customers can customize rate limiting to better manage high traffic periods."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can I customize the chat widget appearance?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes! All plans include basic widget customization like colors and position. Pro and higher plans also get access to unbranded widgets and advanced customization options including custom CSS, custom icons, and the ability to fully integrate the chat experience into your website's design."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What kind of analytics do you provide?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Basic analytics (available on Power plan and up) include question volume, answered stats, and satisfaction rates. Advanced analytics (Pro and up) add detailed user interaction data with graphs, unanswered question reports, and AI-powered insights to improve your documentation and bot responses. Business plans also get access to our AI question reports for deeper analysis of topics question topics with clustering."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How secure is DocsBot?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"We take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and we use industry-standard security practices. Business and Enterprise plans include additional security features like IP logging and SSO options. For organizations with specific security requirements, we offer Enterprise plans with Azure OpenAI Service integration and self-hosted options for your training data."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What support options are available?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"All plans include access to our documentation, AI, and email support with 24-hour response times. Enterprise plans can include custom SLAs and dedicated support channels."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can I import my existing chat history?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes! You can import existing chat logs and support tickets to train your bot. This is especially useful for support teams looking to automate responses to common questions. We support importing from various formats including CSV, JSON, and direct integration with help desk platforms like Freshdesk, Zendesk, Intercom, and Help Scout."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What types of content sources can I use?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"All paid plans support a wide range of source types including websites (via sitemap or crawler), PDFs, Word documents, Markdown files, HTML, RSS feeds, GitHub repositories, and more. You can also manually add content or use our API to programmatically update your knowledge base."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can I automatically update my DocsBot sources?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes you can enable scheduled source updates for compatible sources like URLs, RSS feeds, and Sitemaps. Depending on your plan you can do this monthly, weekly, or daily. You can also manually refresh your sources at any time on all plans."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What are source 'Pages'?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"When you train your bot using various sources we calculate how many pages were imported. Each page is equivalent to 5000 characters of cleaned-up raw text. For example if you import your website via sitemap that may have hundreds or thousands of pages depending on the URL count and how much text is on each. Different plans have different page limits depending on your needs."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Do you have an API I can use?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes! We have a public API that you can use to integrate DocsBot into your own applications. You can find the documentation here: https://docsbot.ai/documentation/developer. We also have our admin API for managing your DocsBots and sources."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What are your privacy protections?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"We generally don't store PII unless you specifically upload it, or a user provides it in a question to your bots. We store queries and responses in our database to be able to provide and improve on the service. Queries and responses also pass through OpenAI and are subject to their privacy policy as well. Please see our privacy policy and DPAfor more details: https://docsbot.ai/legal/privacy-policy."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Are you GDPR compliant?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes, we are GDPR compliant. We act as a data processor for our customers and provide all necessary tools and documentation to help you maintain GDPR compliance. This includes Data Processing Agreements (DPAs), data export capabilities, and the ability to delete user data on request. We also ensure that all data processing activities are conducted in accordance with GDPR principles and that data is stored securely within EU-based servers or has proper data transfer protections when required. For Enterprise customers, we can offer additional GDPR-specific features and customizations."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Do you have an affiliate program?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes! We have a generous affiliate program that pays out 25% of the revenue from any customer you refer to us for the first 12 months of their account. This includes plan upgrades, and can provide as much as a $1,500 commission per referral! We provide a 60 day cookie and 45 day payout schedule via PayPal. You can signup here: https://docsbot.firstpromoter.com/."}}]}
